ygData.subject: RE: utter fustration (but with a humorous ending) - OT
ygData.msgSnippet: ... After my first day in the priest room in Sol B, I turned off all hits and misses except those made by me and on me.  I was of the same opinion as you at
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
> I used to try this, but in my parties, which are usually tank
> heavy, so much
> is flying by in the chat window that I'm already at information overload.
> Maybe I should turn on some of those filters... Nah, I can't
> stand to miss
> something :-). It wouldn't be the same if I didn't throw in that "Nice
> Crit!!" comment here or there.


After my first day in the priest room in Sol B, I turned off all hits and
misses except those made by me and on me. I was of the same opinion as you
at that time, but the spam from three different groups of 6 in three
different room around the priest room changed my mind. :)

This is a long winded way of saying I still get to say nice Crit, because
apparently that is something that can't be turned off. I still see each and
every one of them.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 44 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
